CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 6, 1959, page 2 reads: "Belmar School Dedication - Last Friday, dedication services were held for the new addition to Belmar School in Homewood, which was completed on March 26. Platform guests, above, include, standing: Mrs. C. Winston, president P.T.A. as she delivers the welcome address. Seated, left to right; William Howell, executive director, Kay Boys Club; Dr. Calvin E. Gross, superintendent of public schools; Mrs. Russell Prata, program chairman, Belmar P.T.A.; Dr. L.A. Kalassay, of the Belmar School Staff; Atty. Thomas E. Barton and State Representative Leo J. McLaughlin. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mrs. C. Winston standing, next to table with William Howell, Dr. Calvin E. Gross, Mrs. Russell Prata, Dr. L.A. Kalassay, Atty. Thomas E. Barton, and Leo J. McLaughlin seated, with Belmar School students seated for dedication services in Homewood
